steps.conclusion: Includes a law course title without jurisdiction: "Derecho Penal". This directly violates the rule to never suggest a law course without a jurisdiction and contradicts the Expectations (titles like "Derecho Penal" must not appear).

The english_title for "Derecho Penal Mexicano" is less idiomatic as "Mexican Penal Law"; the most appropriate translation is "Mexican Criminal Law". All other fields meet language and formatting constraints.

Replace the non-jurisdiction title with a compliant one (e.g., "Derecho Penal Mexicano" or another distinct Mexican-law topic like "Derecho Procesal Penal Mexicano"). Adjust english_title to "Mexican Criminal Law".
